sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
STOWMARKET, a town of Suffolk, in England, ſituated in E. Long. 1. 6. N. Lat. 52. 16. It is a large
handſome place, situated between the branches of the rivers Gypping and Orwell, and is remarkable ſor having the best cherries in England.
